reviews.review_msg: You will be remembered as one of the greatest professors SFU has ever had the pleasure of having. I'm going to finish the rest of my engineering degree in your honor. RIP Legend
Once i was sad and walking down the street. A man approached me and asked if everything was okay. That moment changed my life, and now I am the CEO of a big company. That man was Steve Whitmore

He is great. His classes are hilarious. There are lots of work to do as this course is combined by ENSC 100, but they are fine. Easy B if you do all the homework. But you need to do more if you want to get higher mark.

Steve is great. Gave out candy on multiple occasions, and is an all-around good lecturer. Participating in the class is 20% of your grade so show up and comment once every week or so in the discussion boards. Passing this class is not difficult.

He is amazing. His lectures are very helpful. He is also a very nice person and cares about his students. The assignments are time consuming so it's best to not leave it for the last couple days before the deadline. Lectures are engaging and not boring at all. Text book is optional and the one quiz in the middle of semester is not difficult at all.
Mr Whitmore,  Thanks for all the help and support. Truly inspirational and cares about student.
Steve is an amazing professor. He is very reasonable when it comes to grading. He also provides amazing feedback and suggestions.

Slides are actually extremely helpful for writing papers. Covers everything you need to succeed in the course. Tests can involve a lot of material, go over EVERYTHING. Participation was key, you can lose a lot of marks if you don't post on Canvas. The use of tophat was okay, but I didn't really like the additional costs for just this one class.

Very interesting person although, although lectures were boring and long at times. I liked how he tried to engage the class on canvas, although using top hat for participation was a bit annoying. Found writing tips quite helpful! Be sure not to leave paper to the last minute.
One of the best and a very helping prof and funny too. Clarify your doubt very easy and patiently. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED  to take this class will learn a lot more over will improve your personality.
Steve is the man. Really Genuine guy, funny too. Takes a bit of the dullness out of the class. Grind it out, take his wisdom with you and you will go far.
Great professor!
Good teacher, lectures are a bit boring though especially since they are 2 hours long.
No ppoint going to the class. Boring lectures. Terrible when it comes to marking and scaling.
Great prof.!

Very enthusiastic and involved professor. Always willing to take some time out and speak to you if you need help. Attending lectures wasn't very useful but only because I'm pretty good at writing essays anyways. If you're not then you should attend.
Love this prof! don't go on this looks.. he looks kinda mean, but is EXTREMELY nice and friendly when you talk to him. Always willing to help students. Great teacher!
Great teacher
Yea, really good teacher. Easy to listen to. He did this Man in Black thing, attempting to erase our memory, that was REALLY FUNNY.

Extremely friendly, very persuasive. If he doesn't know the answer, will find out for you (for next class). I think he should teach all teachers how to teach; especially about how to answer questions, how to engage the audience, how to keep them interested! Am looking forward to more classes with Steve.

Nice guy, easy courses.  Really believes what he teaches is the holy grail.  Since these courses are required you can't avoid him, so you better buy a pillow now and get ready to catch some sleep. Always get steve to proof read ("do for you") your assignments, then you will get a pass for sure.
i know someone who failed 101. He was only known to me as "crazy hair guy" most incompetant person ever!
University classes don't get easier than this. Pass or fail class (70%), had 74% going into the final. I don't think there was any student that needed more than 30% on the final to pass.
nice guy and easy course.
boring pass/fail class
Good professor, listen to what he says even if you don't think its useful at first. The skills you learn are important in the real world.
is it just me or is everybody wondering about those 8 'hotness' remark?
Funny guy.. but what is the point of this class?
pretty funny and friendly.
No Comments
Easy class... period.
No Comments
He is weird
Lectures are a little boring, but the material is good.
No Comments
No Comments
Great and helpful prof
No Comments
No Comments

Best Prof in the Universe
